distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for gtk2 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2013-7447: Avoid an overflow when allocating a cairo pixbuf (bsc#966682).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Integer overflow in the gdk_cairo_set_source_pixbuf function in gdk/gdkcairo.c in GTK+ before 3.9.8, as used in eom, gnome-photos, eog, gambas3, thunar, pinpoint, and possibly other applications, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a large image file, which triggers a large memory allocation.
notes.title: CVE description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
